blogs.title: Introduction to React
blogs.content: React is a javascript library that is sometimes that is confused for a framework
blogs.author: Mary Wanyama

blogs.title: Main feature of React
blogs.content: there are several react features, one of the is that react is a function oriented language
blogs.author: Mary Wanyama

blogs.title: Props and hooks
blogs.content: props and hooks are used to pass data. state does not need an update from the parent component while props need to be updated from the parent
blogs.author: Mary Wanyama

blogs.title: components
blogs.content: components are building blocks of the React app. They are written as normal function but with a capital letter
blogs.author: Mary Wanyama

blogs.title: Lists and keys
blogs.content: It is important to know when we are dealng with list, lists require a  unique key for every element.
blogs.author: Mary Wanyama

blogs.title: adding vents
blogs.content: React adds events differently from the Js. The event is normally attached to the html element
blogs.author: Mary Wanyama

blogs.title: Routing
blogs.content: Routing helps inclient navigation of the application without refreshing the page. This makes the page fast
blogs.author: Mary Wanyama
